sen.j: 七条警察署襲撃事件（しちじょうけいさつしょしゅうげきじけん）とは、1946年（昭和21年）1月24日に京都府京都市で発生した襲撃事件。
sen.e: The case of an attack on the Shichijo Police Station was an assault that occurred on January 24, 1946 in Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 1946年1月18日、京都府警察部七条警察署は、ヤミ米買出しをしていた朝鮮人を物価統制令違反として現行犯逮捕した。
sen.e: On January 18, 1946, Shichijo Police of the Kyoto Prefectural Police arrested a Korean who was buying rice in the black market for violating the Price Control Act.

sen.j: 連行途中、犯人は隙を見て逃走、在日本朝鮮人連盟の支部に逃げ込んだ。
sen.e: On his way to being taken to the police station, the suspect escaped and ran into the branch of the Association of Korean Residents in Japan.
sen.cmt: 在日本朝鮮人連盟の正式英文名不明。

sen.j: 警察は引渡しを要求したが朝連側は拒否した。
sen.e: The police demanded them to hand in the suspect but the Koreans refused.
The police demanded them to hand over the suspect but the Koreans refused.

sen.j: 1月24日、朝鮮人40人が七条警察署に押しかけ、署長に抗議した。
sen.e: On January 24, forty Koreans forced into the Shichijo Police Station and confronted the chief of the station.
On January 24, 40 Koreans forced their way into the Shichijo Police Station and confronted the chief of the station.

sen.j: また、終戦直後より朝鮮人と対立していた的屋・博徒は、「不良在日外国人、七条署に押しかける」の報に接し、急遽500人が警察の応援に駆けつけた。
sen.e: Street vendors and gamblers who had been clashing with the Koreans since immediately after the end of the war learned that "unlawful foreigners had forced into the Shichijo police station" and 500 of them rushed to the station to support the police.

sen.j: そして、署長が朝鮮人に手錠をかけられようとしたとき、署員とともに的屋・博徒も署長室になだれ込み、朝鮮人を実力で排除した。
sen.e: As the police chief was about to be handcuffed by the Koreans, vendors and gamblers dashed into the station chief's room with police officers and forced the Koreans to leave.

sen.j: 朝鮮人は反撃のために約700人を集結させ、京都駅前で的屋・博徒と大乱闘になった。
sen.e: To retaliate, Koreans gathered about 700 people and a major clash errupted in front of the Kyoto station.

sen.j: 警察はMPの出動を要請し、MPが駆けつけたことで漸く沈静化した。
sen.e: The police asked for the mobilization of the Military Police and the clash was calmed down once the MPs came to the scene.

sen.j: この事件で、日本人1人、朝鮮人数人が死亡、負傷者多数にのぼった。
sen.e: One Japanese and one Korean were killed and many injured in the incident.
